testcase.classname: To validate the login functionality of kavida application
testcase.name: To validte the login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be in kavida login page...............................passed When The user should enter firstname, email and jobtitle....................passed And The user should click the start tour button.............................passed And The user open the Control Tower Action..................................passed Then The user should see the Threats & Alert................................passed And The user click the Order TimeLine Action................................passed And The user click the Communication Hub....................................passed When Click the Compose an Email.............................................passed Then The user should The Add Shipping Information...........................passed When The user Enter Vessel Tracking Id.....................................passed And The user click the Global Risks.........................................passed Then The user should be in valid page.......................................passed
